items.item_details: Financing Corporation President Bruce Swenson will call the meeting to order and report attendance.

Members of the public who wish to address the Foothill-De Anza Community College District Financing Corporation Board of Directors regarding items not on the agenda may do so at this point in the meeting.  Comments are limited to five minutes per person.
Financing Corporation Secretary/Treasurer Linda Thor will provide a report regarding any activity that has occurred since the meeting of December 9, 2013.
Draft minutes of the Foothill-De Anza Community College District Financing Corporation Board of Directors meeting of December 9, 2013, attached.
items.item_recommendation: Financing corporation secretary/treasurer Linda Thor recommends approval of the minutes of the December 9, 2013, Financing Corporation meeting.
items.item_text: Minutes of the 12/9/13 Foothill-De Anza Community College District Financing Corporation Board of Directors Meeting
items.item_text_raw: Minutes of the 12/9/13 Foothill-De Anza Community College District Financing Corporation Board of Directors Meeting

items.item_details: The Board of Directors will elect a president, vice president, and secretary/treasurer to serve until the December 2015 meeting.
items.item_recommendation: It is recommended that the Board of Directors elect a president and vice president and appoint Chancellor Linda Thor as secretary/treasurer of the Foothill-De Anza Community College District Financing Corporation.

items.item_details: The chair will determine if any other business needs to be conducted.
The next meeting of the Foothill-De Anza Community College District Financing Corporation Board of Directors will be held December 7, 2015.
